Model

Class TaxSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Space
      • Model.TaxSpace

  • public class TaxSpace
extends Space
    Tax type extension of the Space class. One extra method is defined defined. Also provides for easier Space instance differentiation. The associated identification number for instances of this class is -2 when INCOME_TAX is true and -3 otherwise.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaxSpace

        public TaxSpace(int nLocationIndex,
                boolean bIncome)
        Constructor for a ChanceSpace object.
        Parameters:
        nLocationIndex - Integer holding the index of a Board instance's boardSpaces attribute in which an instance of this class will be placed.
        bIncome - Boolean variable that differentiates the two instances of this class that will be created upon application run.

    • Method Detail

      • payTax

        public double payTax(Player currPlayer)
        Method that determines the amount of tax to be paid by a Player instance.
        Parameters:
        currPlayer - Player object that will pay the amount to be returned. The dCash attribute of this parameter is also the basis for the returnable value if bIncome is true.
        Returns:
        Double-precision floating point value that is negative if payment is not possible a

      • isIncome

        public boolean isIncome()
        Getter method for the INCOME_TAX attribute of this class.
        Returns:
        Boolean variable that is used for the differentiation of the only two instances of this class.
